channel.title: Help?!
channel.description: hi guys so ive been trying to edit my hosts file in C:/windows/systam 32/drivers/etc (if you wanna check it) and i have windows 7 home premium and as you all might know its a little over secure so their not letting me and i tried to takeown /f in cmd but i dont know the hosts file type all it says is that its type is file so what do i do heres the qustion: C:\Windows\Systam32\drivers\etc\hosts.___________??

item.title: Help?!

item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hi guys so ive been trying to edit my hosts file in C:/windows/systam 32/drivers/etc (if you wanna check it)
and i have windows 7 home premium and as you all might know its a little over secure so their not letting me and i tried to takeown /f in cmd but i dont know the hosts file type all it says is that its type is file so what do i do
heres the qustion:
C:\Windows\Systam32\drivers\etc\hosts.___________??
